ghostPost.title: Cert Exams? Cheatsheets.
ghostPost.html:
Just came across these cheatsheets provided by Salesforce which I think are a superb resource, and I’m a bit annoyed that I hadn’t found them earlier.

These are also a really good resource for studying for certification exams.

Some highlights:

  • Approval, Process Builder, or Flow?
  • Little rusty with Lightning Components?
  • REST APIs make me very happy.
  • Security settings made simple.

Or check them all out here.
